TASK: Craft an item of type: flint_and_steel
inventory=[{"type": "quartz", "quantity": 2, "index": 10}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 13, "index": 18}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 61, "index": 19}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 55, "index": 26}, {"type": "birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 21, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a flint_and_steel, I need to move the flint to slot 1 and the iron_ingot to slot 2. I will first move the flint.
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flint_and_steel
inventory=[{"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 2, "index": 10}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "smooth_red_sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 13, "index": 18}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 61, "index": 19}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 55, "index": 26}, {"type": "birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 21, "index": 41}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
